scripts.build: npx webpack && uglifyjs dist/core.min.mjs -m -c --comments -o dist/core.min.mjs && node add-version-script.js && node add-banner-script.js
scripts.build:prod: npx webpack --mode production && uglifyjs dist/core.min.mjs -m -c --comments -o dist/core.min.mjs && node add-version-script.js && node add-banner-script.js
